actions.desc: The grindylow makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 +1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the grindylow canâ€™t use its claws on another target.
actions.name: Claws

actions.desc:
A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the grindylow if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink.

After releasing the ink, the grindylow can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
actions.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

special_abilities.desc: The grindylow can mimic humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 13 Wisdom (Insight) check.
special_abilities.name: Mimicry

special_abilities.desc: The grindylow has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.
special_abilities.name: Slippery

special_abilities.desc: The grindylow can breathe only underwater.
special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
